title: Prof.OAK
description:
"Welcome to Pokemon Tiles! 
 One the biggest board game in the world of Pokemon!"

title: Prof.OAK
description: "The annual PokeTile Journey is about to begin and everyone can participate!"

title: Prof.OAK
description: "Explore some mysterious places and fight other Poketile Masters. You should try, it will be a good experience!"

title: Prof.OAK
description: "But first, are you a boy or a girl?"

title: Prof.OAK
description:
While you are here, I can register you. 
 What is your name?

title: Prof.OAK
description: Before letting you start your incredible journey, I will help you train a bit. Follow me!
